definitions.definition: An act of investing with a crown ; a crowning .

subdefinitions.definition: An act or the ceremony of formally investing a sovereign or the sovereign's consort with a crown and other insignia of royalty , on or shortly after their accession to the sovereignty .
examples: King Charles III ’s coronation is to be much less elaborate compared to his mother’s.

subdefinitions.definition: A completion or culmination of something.
A success in the face of little or no opposition .

definitions.definition: In the game of checkers or draughts : the act of turning a checker into a king when it has reached the farthest row forward .

main_definition: ( literally , also attributively ) An act of investing with a crown ; a crowning .
secondary_definitions: ( board games , rare ) In the game of checkers or draughts : the act of turning a checker into a king when it has reached the farthest row forward .
